81413.<center>この門を通らんとする者よ\n試練の魔物に挑み 汝のチカラを示せ。:
<center>Thou that wisheth pass through the gate,
challenge the trial monster and demonstrate thy power.

81717.運命の振り子に 少し チカラが宿った。\n振り子を さらなる輝きで満たすために\:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained a little more power.
To make the pendulum shine even brighter, let's try investigating other areas.

81718.運命の振り子が 輝きを放ちはじめた！\nグランゼドーラ城２階の\nLushend:
The Pendulum of Fate began shining brilliantly!
Report back to Lushenda in Gran Zedora
Castle's second floor.

87872.運命の振り子に かなり チカラが宿った。\n３か国をまわったので グランゼドーラ:
The Pendulum of Fate has gained considerable power.
Having toured the 3 regions, let's report back to Lushenda on the 2nd floor of Gran Zedora Castle.

It seems it will take a little more power to make the pendulum shine even brighter.
